channel.title: I try so hard... and it dosn't work
channel.description:
I have figment 4.5, most of the shops don't work, so i try to add them, and just get this error in return... [code]java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: -47 at client.parseIncomingPackets(client.java:16606) at client.packetProcess(client.java:15624) at client.packetSending(client.java:15593) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:138) at server.main(server.java:55) pimpscape Server [fatal] - exception[/code]
every single time, all my players are getting annoied, and im getting frustrated... can some 1 please tell me how to fix this... ='[

item.title: I try so hard... and it dosn't work
item.dc:creator: @dylan_0789 dylan_0789
item.description:
@dylan_0789 wrote:

hmm, i had this same prob awhile back. i think that means ur NPC cant bring up the shop… im not positive though.what id suggest is just editing an already used shop

Read full topic
